experience.title: Manager - S&DP
experience.description: ◦  Spearheaded demand forecasting improvements for Citrus and Coconut categories using descriptive analysis techniques, achieving a 20% boost in Plan Delivery Index ◦  Developed advanced dashboards integrating supply, demand, and operational metrics, streamlining reporting for multiple fruit categories◦  Conducted in-depth customer and supplier cohort analyses, enabling targeted engagement strategies

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: ◦ Led in-depth cost analysis for Krishak V2 spray drone, covering factors like cost per acre, operational, and capital expenditures. ◦  Conducted competitor analysis for Krishak Lite drone, resulting in a performance comparison report and established benchmark specs, leading to a pre-sale order of 400 drones

experience.title: Product Marketing Analyst
experience.description: ◦ Boosted user engagement and revenue growth by analyzing user engagement and creating targeted WhatsApp notification campaigns based on devotional interests, resulting in an increased DTU/DAU ◦ Contributed to product's organic growth by improving App shares to App Installs conversion rates through in-app notifications, story section engagement and referral programs◦ Created data-driven dashboards on Mixpanel for website and app monetized services, aiding informed decisions and business growth

experience.title: Product Operations | Account Manager
experience.description: ◦ Managed end to end client deployments and user acceptance training (UAT) across various industries, including finance, renewable power and legal services◦ Configured and deployed a robust Identity and Access Management system (IRIS) on Provakil platform◦ Optimized product configuration processes by creating demo accounts with Generic Rule engine logics, resulting in a substantial reduction in deployment time

experience.title: Research Project
experience.description: Designed a cutting-edge Coconut Paring machine using Solidworks, that effectively removes the brown and soft outer seed coat. Through the integration of abrasive rollers and precision cutting tools, our team successfully reduced wastage by an impressive 22%

experience.company: Machine Design of Coconut Paring Machine, Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: While at Skymet, I assisted the R&D team on AWS (Automatic Weather Station) and Hyperspectral Imaging Camera technologies, with a particular focus on product development for the latter. My responsibilities also included performing both static and dynamic calibrations on rain gauges of various resolutions at the Indian Meteorological Department in Pune.
